archdesc.runner: Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University

did.head: Descriptive Summary

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: George Mason University. Special Collections and Archives.

did.unittitle: Drew Nemser Conger George Mason College collection
did.abstract: Contains newsclippings and photographs pertaining to the development of George Mason College, now known as George Mason University.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: There are no restrictions on personal use. Permission to publish material from the Drew Nemser Conger George Mason College collection must be obtained from the Special Collections Research Center, George Mason University Libraries.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Drew Nemser Conger George Mason College collection, C0117, Special Collections and Archives, George Mason University Libraries.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Collection donated by Drew Nemser Conger.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Special Collections and Archives staff. EAD markup completed by Eron Ackerman and Jordan Patty in August 2009.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Local, northern Virginia area newsclippings regarding George Mason College; photographs of Director J.N.G. Finley and other GMC Staff; 1963-1964 University of Virginia "Record" (catalog); memorandum dated October 19, 1962, from Mrs. Brett to Mrs. Nemser.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: Special Collections and Archives holds the George Mason University Archives as well as a number of small collections on the history of the university.

did.unittitle: An electronic box inventory is unavailable. Please contact speccoll@gmu.edu for more information.
